Jennifer M. Wang, Ph.D.

Senior Data Scientist & Consultant

I help organizations transform data into strategic decisions. Specializing in machine learning infrastructure, product analytics, and cross-functional leadership to drive measurable business impact.

View My Work Get In Touch

About Me

With over 8 years of experience in data science and analytics, I've helped organizations from startups to established companies build scalable data infrastructure and derive actionable insights from complex datasets.

My expertise spans the full data science lifecycle—from defining product metrics and building ML pipelines to translating technical findings into strategic business decisions. I thrive in cross-functional environments where I can bridge the gap between technical teams and business stakeholders.

Currently, I provide technical consulting through Fieldwork Partners, helping early-stage companies establish their analytics foundations and optimize their data-driven decision making processes.
